name: Remake (Our Little Studio)
description:
Join the battle between biologically enhanced pirates.

This game is a top-down multiplayer brawler created using Unreal Engine 4, featuring characters with unique abilities.

Note: Currently, this game required Hamachi to play. We are working on an online matchmaking system.

Credits
  • Anton Le Prevost-Smith
  • Biran Kim
  • Elizabeth Tan
  • Janet Ang
  • Nick O’Brien
  • Sakyawira Nanda Ruslim
